shared.model.player

Interface IPlayerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivePlayerFacade, InactivePlayerFacade

    public interface IPlayerFacade
    Author:
    Spencer Krieger

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • canBuildCity

        boolean canBuildCity(VertexLocation location)
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the vertex on the board
        Precondition:
        the location is a valid location on the map
        Postcondition:
        returns true if: 1) the player has at least one unplayed city 2) the player has a settlement at that location 3) the player has at least 2 wheat and 3 ore resource cards in their bank 4) the player is the active player returns false if either 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 aren't satisfied.

      • canBuildSettlement

        boolean canBuildSettlement()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if: 1) The player has at least one unplayed settlement 2) The player has at least 1 wood, 1 brick, 1 sheep, 1 wheat 3) the player is the active player returns false if any of the constraints aren't met.

      • canBuildRoad

        boolean canBuildRoad(EdgeLocation location)
        Parameters:
        location - th
        Precondition:
        the location is a valid location on the map
        Postcondition:
        returns true if: 1) the player has at least one unplayed road 2) the player has at least 1 wood and 1 brick 3) the player is the active player returns false if any of the constraints aren't met

      • canBuyDevelopmentCard

        boolean canBuyDevelopmentCard()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if: 1) the player has at least 1 sheep, 1 ore, and 1 wheat 2) the player is the active player returns false if any of the constraints aren't met

      • canPlayCard

        boolean canPlayCard()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player hasn't played a card this turn and it is the active player returns false if any of the constraints aren't met

      • canTrade

        boolean canTrade()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player is the active player returns false if they aren't the active player

      • isActivePlayer

        boolean isActivePlayer()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player is the active player and false if they are not the active player.

      • canAcceptTrade

        boolean canAcceptTrade(java.util.List<ResourceCard> list)
        Parameters:
        list - is a list of cards needed for the transaction
        Precondition:
        the list of cards is a valid list of resource cards
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player has the cards needed for the trade, false if they don't

      • canDiscard

        boolean canDiscard()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player has more than 7 cards and it is their turn otherwise returns false

      • canFinishTurn

        boolean canFinishTurn()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if the player is the active player. Otherwise returns false.

      • canBeRobbed

        boolean canBeRobbed()
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        returns true if it is not the player's turn and they have resource cards. Otherwise returns false.
